passives.name: Immovable as the Earth
passives.effects: Increase your {{as|'''total''' armor}} by {{as|20%|armor}}. Additionally, basic attacks that hit you have a chance of being {{tip|block|blocked}} equal to 5% per {{as|200 '''total''' armor}}, up to a maximum of 50% chance.

effects_structured.raw: Increase your {{as|'''total''' armor}} by {{as|20%|armor}}. Additionally, basic attacks that hit you have a chance of being {{tip|block|blocked}} equal to 5% per {{as|200 '''total''' armor}}, up to a maximum of 50% chance.
